CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: This result leads us to conclude that PTATDPP retains a higher crystalline nature in the blend with PC71BM , affording a better hole transporting pathway and thus exhibiting a higher J SC and FF than PTAFDPP.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PTATDPP |
| PC71BM |

The entities "PTATDPP" and "PC71BM" clearly refer to material names in the paragraph. The entity "PTAFDPP" is not a valid material name in this context, as it is not mentioned as a distinct material in the paragraph.

The entities "PTATDPP", "PC71BM", and "PTAFDPP" refer to specific materials, while "J SC" refers to the joule per square centimeter, which is a unit of measure for the material property of conductivity.
